snippet: The Day: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has caught grief for his plan to limit serving sizes of sugary drinks and for the ever-growing number of New Yorkers who are stopped by the police.
abstract: The Day: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has caught grief for his plan to limit serving sizes of sugary drinks and for the ever-growing number of New Yorkers who are stopped by the police.

headline.main: At City Hall, Not Seeing Moderation in All Things
